title: Philip Morris, Altria Shares Rise After Merger Talks End
text:
By Colin Kellaher

Shares of Altria Group Inc. (MO) and Philip Morris International Inc. (PM) rose in premarket trading on Wednesday after the tobacco giants said they have ended merger talks.

Philip Morris shares were up 6.5% to $76.18, while Altria shares rose 3.1% to $42.

Altria and Philip Morris last month said they were in talks to reunite in an all-stock deal that would have created a company with a market value of roughly $200 billion, but Altria on Wednesday said the companies were unable to reach an agreement.
